params.agent: Address of the agent to execute the task
params.inputHash: Hash of the task input data

returns.agentTasks: Array of task IDs assigned to the agent

returns.orchestratorTasks: Array of task IDs created by the orchestrator

params.favorAgent: Whether to favor the agent (true) or orchestrator (false)

acceptTask(bytes32).notice: Agent accepts and starts executing a task

cancelTask(bytes32).notice: Cancel a pending task (only orchestrator, only if not started)

createTask(address,bytes32,uint256).notice: Create a new task and escrow payment

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Emergency withdrawal (only owner, for stuck funds)

markTaskFailed(bytes32,string).notice: Mark a task as failed (can be called by agent or when deadline passes)

resolveDispute(bytes32,bool).notice: Resolve a disputed task (only authorized disputers)
